text.name: birdFeeder_noAccess
text.text: Birds will not arrive to your bird feeder, please move it to a more open area

text.name: function_birdFeeder
text.text: Placeable bird feeder, remember to buy bird seed and carry it to the feeder, and watch birds come and eat.

text.name: typeDesc_birdSeed
text.text: Food for birds, add this food into the bird feeder bought from the placeables.
